--Grimlock--

Grimlock notices the auto-guns coming on line as tries to find the 
door. He shoots on the auto guns but there are to many for one
Maximal 
to fight against. He tries to dodge out of the way but there is to 
many firing at him. He is hit by on the shoulder as he tries to find 
shelter. 

Grimlock the switches on his com link "Maximals I need help I am
under 
attack."
